column1: The property has never shown any signs or been monitored for subsidence, landslip or heave.
Your current house has not been flooded in the last 10 years, including the land that the property stands on.
Your house is not within 400 metres (¼ mile) of water.
Your house is in a good state of repair and has no cracks in external walls.
Your house is not used for business purposes.
Your property is self-contained (all external doors have key operated locks).
